Gabriel Sea Mineral Hydra Mist

Brand: Gabriel Cosmetics

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Aloe Vera Juice, Glycerin, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) (&) Maltodextrin, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Extract, Spirulina Extract, Malpighia Glabra (Acerola) Extract, Ilex Paraguariensis (Yerba Mate) Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (

arinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Extract, Aesculus Hippocastanum (Horse Chestnut) Extract, Equisetum Arvense (Horsetail) Extract, Fucus Vesiculosus (Bladderwrack) Extract, Matricaria Recutita (Chamomile) Extract, Foeniculum Vulgare (Fennel) Extract

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Develop
LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
